verses.verse: And <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> fell <S%H5307>down<s%> through a <S%H7639>lattice<s%> in his upper <S%H5944>chamber<s%> that was in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, and was <S%H2470>sick<s%>: and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>them<s%>, Go, <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H1176>Baal<s%>–zebub the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> whether I shall <S%H2421>recover<s%> of this <S%H2483>disease<s%>.

But the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, and <S%H1696>say<s%> unto <S%H430>them<s%>, Is it not because there is not a God in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that you <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H1176>Baal<s%>–zebub the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%>?

Now therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, You shall not come <S%H3381>down<s%> from that <S%H4296>bed<s%> on which you are gone <S%H5927>up<s%>, but shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>. And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%>.
And when the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> turned <S%H7725>back<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, he said unto <S%H2088>them<s%>, Why are you now turned <S%H7725>back<s%>?

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5927>him<s%>, There came a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H559>us<s%>, and said unto <S%H3212>us<s%>, Go, turn <S%H7725>again<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> that <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1696>you<s%>, and say unto <S%H559>him<s%>, Thus says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, Is it not because there is not a <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that you <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H1176>Baal<s%>–zebub the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%>? therefore you shall not come <S%H3381>down<s%> from that <S%H4296>bed<s%> on which you are gone <S%H5927>up<s%>, but shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>.
And he <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H4941>them<s%>, What manner of <S%H376>man<s%> was he which came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H1696>you<s%>, and told you these <S%H1697>words<s%>?

And they <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H8181>him<s%>, He was a hairy <S%H1167>man<s%>, and <S%H247>wearing<s%> a <S%H232>belt<s%> of <S%H5785>leather<s%> about his <S%H4975>body<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, It is <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite<s%>.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto him a <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty<s%>. And he went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3427>him<s%>: and, behold, he sat on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of an <S%H2022>hill<s%>. And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H376>him<s%>, You man of <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H1696>said<s%>, Come <S%H3381>down<s%>.

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> to the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, If I be a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, then let <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H398>consume<s%> you and your <S%H2572>fifty<s%>. And there came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H398>consumed<s%> him and his <S%H2572>fifty<s%>.

<S%H7725>Again<s%> also he <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto him <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty<s%>. And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H376>him<s%>, O man of <S%H430>God<s%>, thus has the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%>.

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H376>them<s%>, If I be a man of <S%H430>God<s%>, let <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H398>consume<s%> you and your <S%H2572>fifty<s%>. And the <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H398>consumed<s%> him and his <S%H2572>fifty<s%>.

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> a <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> with his <S%H2572>fifty<s%>. And the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3766>fell<s%> on his <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%>, and <S%H2603>begged<s%> <S%H1696>him<s%>, and said unto <S%H376>him<s%>, O man of <S%H430>God<s%>, I pray <S%H5315>you<s%>, let my life, and the <S%H5315>life<s%> of these <S%H2572>fifty<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%>, be <S%H3365>precious<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%>.

<S%H3381>Behold<s%>, there came <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and burnt <S%H398>up<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H2572>fifties<s%> with their <S%H2572>fifties<s%>: therefore let my <S%H5315>life<s%> now be <S%H3365>precious<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H452>Elijah<s%>, Go <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H3372>him<s%>: be not afraid of <S%H6440>him<s%>. And he <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and went <S%H3381>down<s%> with him unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And he <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, Thus says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, Forasmuch as you have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H1176>Baal<s%>–zebub the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%>, is it not because there is no <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of his <S%H1697>word<s%>? therefore you shall not come <S%H3381>down<s%> off that <S%H4296>bed<s%> on which you are gone <S%H5927>up<s%>, but shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>.

So he <S%H4191>died<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> which <S%H452>Elijah<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%>. And <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his stead in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; because he had no <S%H1121>son<s%>.

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> which he <S%H6213>did<s%>, are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?
